columns.name: Booking Date
columns.description: Date when the transaction was booked

columns.name: Value Date
columns.description: Date when the transaction value is effective

columns.name: Partner Iban
columns.description: IBAN of the transaction partner (optional, often empty)

columns.name: Payment Reference
columns.description: Payment reference or memo (optional, often empty)

columns.name: Amount (EUR)
columns.description: Transaction amount in EUR (negative for debits, positive for credits)

columns.name: Original Amount
columns.description: Original amount in original currency (for foreign transactions)

notes: Amount (EUR) is negative for outgoing transactions (debits)
Amount (EUR) is positive for incoming transactions (credits)
Partner Name field contains merchant names or transaction details
Type field indicates transaction type (Presentment, Direct Debit, Transfer, Fee, etc.)
No separate balance field in N26 exports
